name: PlatformerSaves
description: Save and load your progress in platformer levels!

auto-save.name: Autosave
auto-save.description: Automatically saves the game when reaching a new checkpoint.

editor-saves.name: Editor level saves
editor-saves.description: Enables saving the game in editor levels (unstable). If the level gets edited after saving all progress must be reset.

remove-save-on-complete.name: Remove save on complete
remove-save-on-complete.description: Removes the save file for a level once it is completed.

level-version-warning.name: Updated level version warning
level-version-warning.description: Show a warning when opening a save file that was updated from a previous version of the level.

psf-version-warning.name: Updated save file warning
psf-version-warning.description: Show a warning when opening a save file that was updated from a previous PlatformerSaves version.
